thread.title: Katy Perry Gets Entranced At Oblivia In 'Chained To The Rhythm' Video
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Gets Entranced At Oblivia In 'Chained To The Rhythm' Video

title: Katy Perry Gets Entranced At Oblivia In 'Chained To The Rhythm' Video
text:
Katy Perry Gets Entranced At Oblivia In 'Chained To The Rhythm' Video posted by James Dinh - 
Just as she teased on Saturday, Katy Perry is caught in an endless routine in her just-released "Chained To The Rhythm" music video, which dropped on Tuesday morning (February 21).   "artist", "id" : 35141, "name" : "Katy Perry" } } 
Directed by Matthew Cullen ("Dark Horse" and "California Gurls"), "Chained To The Rhythm" sees the pop star embark on a magical visit to an amusement park called Oblivia. During her time, she marvels at the entertainment and hops on a rollercoaster, all while the attendees of the park engage in a dangerously non-stop Stepford Wives -esque rhythm. They're all cheerfully in sync. They're all happily waiting to hop on the next ride. 
Shot over three days at "thrill capital of the world" Six Flags Magic Mountain in Valencia, CA, the all-too-jolly visit is disrupted when Perry pricks her finger on a rose and breaks out of conformity to Skip Marley 's bars about the power of the people. 
"Chained To The Rhythm" is the lead single from the pop star's upcoming fifth album and was co-written by Perry, Max Martin , Sia Furler , Ali Payami and Marley. WELCOME TO OBLIVIA WHERE EVERYTHING IS ALWAYS ROSY: https://t.co/X1vMe9s3zS Directed by Mathew Cullen FT @SkipMarley #CTTRVIDEO 鹿 pic.twitter.com/E6pJ0IztME — KATY PERRY (@katyperry) February 21, 2017 
Photo: Rony Alwin
